::: {style="flex: 1;"} ## About Junnan Hi, Iâ€™m Junnan, an undergraduate in Data Science & Statistics at UCLA. My life has been shaped by turning points and restartsâ€”from moving between cities in childhood, to switching from humanities to STEM, to restarting my college path in the U.S. At community college, I rebuilt from zero: I founded the Math Club, organized competitions, and served as a Student Services Senator, graduating with a 3.97 GPA.\ This led me to UCLA, where I now maintain a 3.7 GPA while pursuing my passion for statistics, data science, and machine learning. Through two ongoing research positions, I apply data methods in medicine, the social sciences, and advanced machine learning.\ Each experience deepens my interest in data-driven research and strengthens my goal of continuing to graduate study in data science and statistics. ------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## Research Interests - Applied Statistics & Machine Learning\ - Data Science for Medicine & Health\ - Statistical Computing\ - LLM and ML :::
